title: Guan Yin
desc: This statue has been consecrated to bring peace and compassion to your household. It acts as a stabilizer for the home's energy field.

title: Golden Wu Lou
desc: The ultimate symbol of health and longevity. The lid can be opened to place written wishes or protective mantras inside.

title: Wealth Ingot
desc: A heavy ingot (Yuan Bao) symbolizing the accumulation of wealth. Best placed in the Southeast corner (Wealth Sector).
